sentences.en: A man like Barbicane would not dodge his enemy, or ensnare him, would not even maneuvre!
sentences.cn: 巴比康这个人即使对他的敌人也不会耍花招, 设圈套,用心计的.

sentences.en: But METAL and EARTH does have the magical power to ensnare me in this cornucopia.
sentences.cn: 但[金]与[土]就是有着一份魔力,让我忘返的溜连这个大观园.

sentences.en: Ensnare - This ability is no longer dispellable, and it can target magic - immune units.
sentences.cn: 诱捕 - 这个技能不再能够被驱散, 并且可以作用于魔法免疫单位.

sentences.en: Entangling Roots and Ensnare work on Heroes again.
sentences.cn: 树根缠绕和诱捕再次对英雄有效.

sentences.en: Feminism is simply another device to ensnare women.
sentences.cn: 女权主义只是使女性陷入圈套的另一种手段。

sentences.en: He was concerned the campaign could ensnare innocent people.
sentences.cn: 他担心这场运动可能会陷害无辜的人。

sentences.en: I can teach you how to bewitch the mind and ensnare the senses.
sentences.cn: 我会教你们如何蛊惑意志,俘获感觉.

sentences.en: Mt . 22:15 Then the Pharisees went and took counsel how they ensnare Him in His words.
sentences.cn: 太二二15当时,法利赛人去商议,怎样就著耶稣的话陷害他.

sentences.en: The spider must wait for prey to be ensnared on its web.
sentences.cn: 蜘蛛一定要耐心等待，直到猎物被它的蛛网困住。

sentences.en: To catch or ensnare in or as if in a net.
sentences.cn: 捕获像是在网中捉住或网进.

sentences.en: To ensnare or prevail over with trickery.
sentences.cn: 诈骗用诡计使相信或说服.

sentences.en: To trap or ensnare, as by a stratagem.
sentences.cn: 诱捕设计使落入陷井或使入圈套.

words.tran_cn: 诱捕；诱入陷阱；进入罗网

trans.tran_en: to catch an animal in a trap

trans.tran_cn: 诱捕，使入陷阱，使入圈套
